id.comment: Which is the assignment that modifies c?

query.querystr: assign a; select a pattern a("c",_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment that modifies some variables?

query.querystr: assign a; select a pattern a(_,_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment that d = a?

query.querystr: assign a; select a pattern a("d","a");

id.comment: Which is the assignment that modifies d uses a?

query.querystr: assign a; select a pattern a("d",_"a"_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment that modifies c uses x?

query.querystr: assign a; select a pattern a("c",_"x"_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment that modifies c uses b?

query.querystr: assign a; select a pattern a("c",_"b"_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment that c = q?

query.querystr: assign a; select a pattern a("c","q");

id.comment: Which is the assignment that has expression a?

query.querystr: assign a; select a pattern a(_,"a");

id.comment: Which is the assignment that has expression q?

query.querystr: assign a; select a pattern a(_,"q");

id.comment: Which is the assignment that has expression q?

query.querystr: assign a; select a pattern a(_,_"q"_);

id.comment: Which is the while that has control variable b?

query.querystr: while w; select w pattern w("b",_);
while w; select w pattern w(_,_);

id.comment: Which is the assigment modifies c uses q?

query.querystr: assign a; select a such that Modifies(a,"c") pattern a("c",_"q"_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment modifies c uses x and z?

query.querystr: assign a; select a such that Uses(a,"x") pattern a("c",_"z"_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment modifies c and follows some statements?

query.querystr: assign a; select a such that Follows*(_,a) pattern a("c",_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment modifies c and follows some statements?

query.querystr: while w;assign a; select w such that Parent(w,a) pattern w("b",_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment with a constant that modifies c?

query.querystr: assign a; select a pattern a("c",_"1"_);
